dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A

dialogue_turns.text: I know, right? I literally read that and had to, uh, reread it like three times.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Which, honestly, for a world-class star like JLo? You know there are, like, super high requirements.

dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And the government is backing it. Full state support!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We, on the part of the government, will provide all the necessary support," he concluded.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's the part that gets me. Not just for this concert, but for Kazakhstan to become, quote, "a permanent venue for large-scale cultural events."
